did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Correspondence, reports, subject files, and personal and professional papers.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Correspondence, reports, subject files, and personal and professional papers; includes an article: "Economic Transition of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam." Also, "Vietnam Files" and computer printouts; and records of the regional plan and development of the Arusha Region of Tanzania.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Cornell University graduate, planning and management consultant, professor.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, reports, subject files, and personal and professional papers; includes an article: "Economic Transition of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam." Also, "Vietnam Files" and computer printouts; and records of the regional plan and development of the Arusha Region of Tanzania.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Charles F. Sweet papers, #4827. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
